page.title: 09A CHILD'S DAY IN WELSHPOOL
page.content: I am 12 years old and live in Welshpool. Like most other weekdays I get up at 07.00 and have breakfast with my father and twin sister. I then shower and get dressed in my school uniform of a blue skirt and jumper,a white blouse and a green and silver tie. Before I go to school I have to take our two pet dogs for a walk. I arrive in school at about 08.40 and at 08.55 go to my classroom for registration. We then have assembly until about 9.15 a.m. Afterwards we go to lessons (8 of them!) until 15.45 p.m. with an hour's break for lunch. After walking home I start on my homework which takes up most of the evening, but when that's finished I sit down with my family and watch television. I go to bed at about 21.30.
